name: Redstone Integrator
category: 進階電腦週邊設備：週邊設備

pages.text: The Redstone Integrator is able to interact with redstone. You can use the same code you would use for a computer on a Redstone Integrator.$(p)You may need this peripheral for cases where you need to output redstone signals on more sides than a regular computer has to offer.$(p)For the full documentation please see the $(9)$(l:https://docs.srendi.de/peripherals/redstone_integrator/)official wiki page$(/l)$()!

mapping.0: 計算機工藝：進階計算機

pages.text: Connect your Redstone Integrator to a computer to make use of it!
